Articles.Content:
New Kerbal here! Spending my first hours in space. Just realized that I've sent my Kerbals up in space without any engines! Floating away, I guess .

This game is so cool, I'm really happy I decided to go for the Steam sale. I've played the demo before but it honestly doesn't represantate the current game state anymore. It's so much better than the demo!

**would trust someone who sends you in space with no knowledge about rocket science other than what he learned on Youtube?**

Cheers!

Welcome!

Of course I would trust someone to strap a fuel tank with an engine under my chair and send me to space. Plus I'm sure all rocket scientists studied using Youtube

Edited September 17, 2013 by Crashonaut
'Sup, welcome and have fun in the game and in the forums.
If they're in orbit you might be able to organize a rescue mission! Also welcome!
